title: Sampler, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross, stem and satin stitch on plain weave foundation, primarily counted stitches
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Adam and Eve with the Tree of Life and isolated motifs of animals, birds and flowers.
